why_do_you_need_ZMOT.text: Understanding your Consumer Behavior and helping them to achieve their goals during the Customer Journey should be your top priority. As a marketer or entrepr1neur, once you master some principles you'll have a way more effective communication.
why_do_you_need_ZMOT.category_1_text: The modern consumer uses Google as the main tool to search for information. Be well positioned in search engines is guaranteed to be present in the moment that people are interested.
why_do_you_need_ZMOT.category_2_text: The experience of other people influence your decision making Wod of mouth is stronger than ever.
why_do_you_need_ZMOT.category_3_text: The consumer has full control, they find and share information in their own way and time..

specialist.text: ZMOT is a thing of great people. See what the leading experts in Digital Marketing has been talking about it.
specialist.slide_1_text: Consumers search the information on the Internet before buying.
specialist.slide_2_text: That's how consumers live, lear and make decisions today.
specialist.slide_3_text: Digital marketing is about delievering the right content at the right time.
